author: Alessandro Orsini
text: "Ordered through the app then the store was closed when I went to pick it up (at 5pm!!). The people inside wouldn't let me in and I didn't get a refund."

author: Christian Salas
text: 'Why are you guys opening at 4 now????'

author: Nidhi Shah
text: "Poor service
column5: waited over an hour for order made online and never received it
column6: staff didn't care at all."

author: Mike Ciaglia
text: 'Have been multiple times but this Chip just misses the mark. Disappointing.'

author: jimmy B
text: 'Where to begin? You can walk all the way there and they will tell you it’s online order only even though there’s 10 workers behind the counter. But if that’s not bad enough they’re literally always out of something. Last week I went they were completely out of chips
column5: steak
column6: cheese
column7: and ice in the soda machine. When I went today they were out of rice. You’re better off walking to the Jersey City location because this one is such a mess. I rarely leave reviews but this Chipotle makes me question if life is even worth living.'

author: Brian M
text: 'I rarely leave reviews for anything
column5: but this is the 4th time in a month they messed up my order. I used to work at a chipotle and to be honest
column6: it’s really not that hard to complete an online order especially when it’s not their peak time. Can’t say I’ll be ordering from them again'

author: Brad Hendrick
text: 'They close at 730pm'

author: Mark Godwilling
text: 'Sometimes good but most times the level of service is bad. Portions are always given out a wrong amounts
column5: the pick up is always delayed
column6: and it seems like employees really could care less about you. Attendants are also not always wearing masks.'

author: AJ Angelosante
text: 'If you want the wrong order and bad food 100% of the time you should order from here'

author: Changwoo Ham
text: "I’m not usually the person that posts reviews on any places
column5: but with the experience I had with this Chipotle today
column6: I felt like I had to post something about it.\n\nSo I ordered a chicken bowl and a side of chips through the app and it told me that my order would be ready for pickup at around 2:20. I arrive at around 2:18 to pick up my food and my food doesn't come out until 2:30. This I understand because they were a bit short staffed in the front
column7: but as I get my food
column8: I find that my chips aren’t in the bag and asked the lady at the register where my chips are? To which she replies that they didn’t have chips and just told me to get a refund online. This I also didn’t care as much about because its just a bag of chips
column9: but still pretty annoyed because my order came out 10 minutes late.\n\nAfter getting my order
column10: I had no time to eat at the location because I had a train to catch and as I got to the station and looked at my order
column11: I find that my order is completely wrong and the bowl looking as if it was half eaten or swept to the side because there was not enough food inside the bowl. Either way
column12: this is completely unacceptable and I’d advise everyone to not order from this location because clearly they lack the understanding of good customer service.\n\nTLDR: Food came out late
column15: and got a completely different item from what I ordered looking half tossed around like a football"

author: Adam Cohen
text: 'Disappointing Chipotle location. Staff is slow to replenish items on the line. There was no ice available
column5: and no plates or bowls available for dine-in. We were eating off of foil in the dining room.'

author: Jamie Hawkins
text: 'Literally nobody takes orders here. You HAVE to order online. The tables are dirty. There’s no chips and guac on the menu although it’s clearly visible behind the serving counter… Please do better.'

author: Dhananjay Salgaocar
text: 'The only good reason to come here is you get a reason to complain to customer service and you get a refund + free entree for the next time'

author: Fred Gladis
text: 'I get there to find out it’s ordering only because they’re too backed up
column5: and that it would take 30 minutes. Went to restaurant next door and was out within 5 mins'

author: Erik Anderson
text: 'I’ve been to this Chipotle >20 times and not sure why I keep going back because about 1/3 of those times I go there to pick up my online order I am waiting > 1 hour after my pick up time and many of times my order is completely wrong. Staff is completely unprofessional and disorganized
column5: basically useless. I doubt they know the difference between a burrito and a bowl. This problem has become a pattern here and nothing is being done to fix it. I understand you can become overwhelmed with orders but the fact that I have experienced this as often as I have
column6: it’s clearly a ‘you’ problem.'

author: Chelsea Chelios
text: 'Ordered a quesadilla and double steak there was no chicken in the yes a dollar and the bowl was missing the steak fajitas and sauce and lettuce and rice'

author: Ben g
text: "They only do online orders with a full staff and open store.  And they always scam you on the bowls!  You're better off walking to jersey city and going to their chipotle!"

author: Lopa Nath
text: 'Ordered on the app
column5: got home to a half full bowl and missing toppings. Never had a good experience with them but it’s the only one nearby. Can Chipotle do something about this awful franchise location or what?'

author: Antonio Rezik
text: "Took a day to write this because I was extremely upset in the moment
column5: and wanted to cool off. I arrived about ten minutes before closing and was waiting in a short line
column6: there is only one young bilingual lady operating the front by herself. After a minute or so I noticed a sign on the glass between the customers and servers saying cash only. Having no cash on hand I decided to run around the corner and get cash from the atm. I returned in line behind the woman who was behind me originally. It's about three minutes before closing and the young lady starts to take my order when
column7: who I can only assume is her manager
column8: a gentleman with make up on comes to the front and tells me and the other customer behind me that the store is closed. The young lady attempts to explain that I was in line but had to leave to get cash
column9: but he would not hear it and instructed her to throw out my order.\n\nI give two stars because that young lady was hustling and served the half dozen of us and fully intend on serving me and the other gentleman behind me. But the manager was rude and unwilling to listen to me or his employee. I understand having a card reader break and going cash only
column10: but you need to understand if I have to walk two minutes to get cash from the atm in the pouring rain
column11: the least you can do is stay open a minute or two later to complete mine and the gentleman's behind me order. I do like chipotle but will no long be giving any of my business to this location."

author: Alex DeFelice
text: "It's such a shame that this is such a bad Chipotle location. I give them a try again every 2 months and it's always something. Walked out of line today as the staff was yelling at each other over the food not being prepped."

author: Jose Silva
text: 'I have been to countless chipotles across the US and this is hands down the worst of them all and unfortunately is my local chipotle. Rice is always hard as a rock
column5: chips are constantly soggy and stale
column6: and portions are always tiny. The staff here is also poorly ran and no body seems to care. It’s so bad I drive out of my way to a chipotle in the town over to avoid these experiences all together.'

author: Elizabeth Wasserman
text: "Chipotle is chipotle. It's good..usually. This chipotle is close to my house so I go pretty often. The last 5 times I have ordered from here something has gone wrong. Ordered a chicken bowl with almost every topping and received steak
column5: rice
column6: and cheese... Came here to get a bowl in person and they were out of fajita veggies AND guac for the veggie bowl. Food is standard when they get it right."

author: Ricky Vargas
text: 'Excellent'

author: Isabel Alleyne
text: 'Very hit or miss
column5: but sadly usually a miss :('

author: Rahul Srivastava
text: 'I like Chipotle in general. But this store is definitely understaffed which results in long wait times
column5: order cancellation and just unpleasant experience. As a Hoboken local
column6: i wish Chipotle would take notice and fix the issue.\n\nMy order has been canceled/delayed beyond 30 mins several times. Not going to waste my time here at this location again.'

author: Luis Rivera
text: "If I could give this 0 stars I really would. This is the worst chipotle I have ever been to. The chicken tasted old
column5: the rice was hard and the beans were a b it uncooked. To top it all of the chips we're extremely stale. This isn't the first time it has happened either but it is the last time I'm ever ordering from here. Save yourself the time and go order somewhere else trust me."

author: Bryan
text: 'Same chipotle
column5: terrible service'

author: saroj lenka
text: 'Starts with One liner "need some cleanness and proper spaces in meat and veggies containers".\nNot sure why most of the Chipotle keep the veggies and meat containers so close and next to each other. Why they forget veggies has to be veggies
column5: there is a chance of meat fall in veggie container while filling bowl or wraps. Chicken and meat eaters its ok
column6: but not for vegetarians.'

author: Ameya desai
text: 'Great service'

author: Rajeshkumar Thankaraj
text: 'Good place'

author: kartik Ravat
text: 'Worst staff ever meet
column5: very disappointed'

author: Mallory Lasko
text: 'Chipotle gave me the wrong order 2x'

author: Giselle Ross
text: "Highly upset with my order. I placed it on door dash at 10:00am. Received my order at 11:30ish - which was good but the food was awful there was cheese only on the middle taco
column5: the food was cold and my chips were stale- no crunch and I couldn't even bite into one. I was looking forward to this lunch for no reason."

author: Siva S
text: 'Worst staff it’s almost one more hour to close almost everything is over and they are not even looking to fill there is no rice no black beans and no lettuce'

author: Addison Taylor
text: 'Health department would have legit shut them down this afternoon. Kitchen/serving area was inexcusably disgusting. Creepy help. Avoid for the time being.'

author: Saraih Cruz
text: "I would like to give a massive thank you to the three people that were on the front working for hours on hours on end. Jaylynn
column5: Trinity
column6: and Lizzie
column7: I was on line for possibly 45 minutes
column8: they were clearly going through a rush and by the looks of these other reviews it seems like an everyday experience at this Chipotle. During that entire wait they must've served and made over a hundred different orders
column9: yet they maintained their strong will
column10: their kindness and understanding of the customers frustrations
column11: and were trying to get the line moving as quickly as they possibly could. As someone who has worked in the food industry I have complete understanding of how frustrating it is for customers to try and rush you over something that is beyond your control. This Chipotle has way too many people coming into their store everyday overworking these diligent employees to the bone and I have yet to see any gratitude for these workers in reviews or in person. Once again I would like to thank those three employees
column14: and Lizzie for being outstanding workers who deserve nothing but the best (most definitely a promotion) As well as all other employees that work for this particular Chipotle. Keep up the outstanding work and I hope nothing but the best for this location. Hopefully customers will understand and appreciate the effort you are all giving each and every single day."

author: Mike Bonham
text: 'Took over 2 hours to get delivery.  Look elsewhere.'

author: SY Q
text: 'Rice is not fully cooked and hard! And the portion is so small when you order online.'

author: Nick Ayers
text: 'Place is going downhill quickly. Rice is not cooked and hard. Portions also cut in half compared to other Chipotles'

author: DJ Marly Mar
text: 'Service Slow Sometimes ... According to the one employee the Register shuts down on its own at different times during the day'

author: Ankush Patel
text: 'Consistently this chipotle makes mistakes on take out orders even with those 25 inch screens infront of them
column5: breaking it down what goes inside the bowl.  I understand you make a mistake once or twice but this is now the fifth or sixth time this has happened. Poor training and poor management. If you order meat you end up with no meat. If you order a tortilla it’s missing. Sometimes you end up with a puddle of water at the bottom of the bowl like a nice soup. Yes
column6: the chipotle app is nice to offer compensation or a free meal but then I have to order again and get the same thing happen. Wont be ordering from here again. period. Stay away folks.'

author: Usama Nazeer
text: 'The Jersey City location was the worst experience in a while ... Fortunately the food was good Lmao'

author: Ryan McLaughlin
text: 'Could quite possibly be the worst chipotle out there'

author: Jude Sargent
text: 'Constantly get the order wrong
column5: and leave stuff out of the order.'

author: Soo Back
text: 'I found a dirty piece of plastic wrap INSIDE my burrito. Absolutely disgusting.'

author: Izaiah Hayward
text: 'Ordered my food with Uber eats
column5: first they put the wrong rice on my bowl and everything else tastes old and they were very stingy with the amount of food they put
column6: I got a side order of chips with guacamole and the chips were definitely old as well'

author: Jackson Luis
text: 'Food is always fantastic
column5: will update to 5 stars when the estimates are more accurate. I understand the wait
column6: just wish it was properly shown when you order online.'

author: DM
text: "I tried to place an order online but for some reason it didn't allow me to so we decided to eat in as there was no line and we got parking. The lady behind the counter helping with our order was so CLUMSY
column5: she was dumping spoonfuls of options in the bowl like they would in the prison and the salsa and sofritas sauce was dripping between the food containers everytime she took a spoonful to put in our bowls.\nAnd to top it the cauliflower rice was tasting stale and the guac was very salty."

author: Abhishek Allen
text: 'Horrible experience ordering for pick up. I ordered chicken burrito bowl. When I opened the box
column5: it may be half of what you usually get when you order in the store. 3-4 pieces of chicken only and some of the toppings were missing. I will not be ordering online for pickup anymore and will wait for in store ordering to start in future. Very disappointed!'

author: Luis dominguez
text: 'Delicious burritos.'

author: Yuriy Rusko
text: 'Pickup order promised for 3:30
column5: still not ready at 3:55. All I got was "if it\'s not out front
column6: then they\'re still working on it in the back." It\'s fine if it\'s taking a bit longer due to high demand
column7: but go ahead and specify a realistic pickup time
column8: and then I won\'t have to run back to my car to feed the meter.\n\nAlso
column9: pretty much all the staff need a refresher course on mask-wearing.\n\nFood-wise
column10: the white rice was crunchy.\n\nWe\'re batting 0 here.'

author: Carolyn Vaccaro
text: "Ordered my food at 6:47pm thru seamless. Got 1 call from a driver at 8:17 which resulted in nothing. Called the next driver at 8:19pm which resulted in nothing. Received call at 9:02pm from Grubhub regarding the order. Was resubmitting the order and did not get any update on the app. 9:31 spoke to agent at Grubhub and simultaneously got a message by text from them saying the order was cancelled and refunded.\nEXTREMELY disappointed
column5: enraged
column6: etc about this order. NOT GOING TO ORDER HERE AGAIN and hope you don't either. The restaurant doesn't pick up their phone either.\nTERRIBLE. The system does not work regardless if it is from the restaurant itself or on another website.\nALSO
column7: the previous times I ordered from them the serving size has been so small- not accurate and not the quality I expect from a Chipotle. What a disgrace."

author: Roman Makovey
text: 'Consistently a poor experience at this specific location. I always go to other chipotle locations'

author: Toxichammertoe
text: "The guy at the register was very rude and disrespectful
column5: guy was charging up my Free chip and Guac
column6: he didn't know what he was doing

author: Sidney Suggs
text: 'Terrible ! Can’t even go in and order anything'

author: Tony Ferrer
text: 'Their food is not woth the long time people have to wait for it.'

author: Dylan Adams
text: 'Unfriendly
column5: incompetent and unable to manage online orders'

author: Tianhao Wu
text: 'Order management time estimates are way off. There were a dozen people waiting for their orders which imo is not great during a pandemic and could be a public health risk. Need to be more timely or at least block off timeslots on online ordering when they are backlogged.'

author: Mike Winschuh
text: 'When ordering online the orders are consistently wrong and always late. The bowls and burritos are under filled (even when you pay for extra)
column5: and the service is embarrassingly bad. THIS IS WITHOUT A DOUBT THE WORST CHIPOTLE CHAIN THAT I’VE EVER BEEN TO. DO NOT CONSIDER EATING HERE.'

author: Paul
text: 'Ordered online about 10 times now and 7 out of 10 times they have missed an item or gave ridiculously small portions and for the first time today they managed to do both. Do not order from this Chipotle online.'

author: Katya Rempel
text: 'My order was never delivered because postmates driver stole my food! Horrible customer service. Before we got to the core of the issue they were lying to me for 2 hours that the food is on the way! Shame on postmates. Never order through them!'

author: Benjamin Atwater
text: 'Ordered in app pick up for 115 as it said that was soonest available time to pick up
column5: but here I am waiting at 1:40 and still it is not ready. The staff said they’re running 15 minutes behind but I see orders waiting on pickup shelf for 115 and even 130. I understand it’s busy and would not be mad if the app set the earliest pickup time to later but I’m about to miss an important business call at 2 - we’ve been doing pandemic for a year no excuse anymore especially a chain like chipotle'

author: mecks tv
text: 'Said it would take 10 minutes. Took over 40 minutes. We’re EXTREMELY rude when I inquired as to how this was possible. Not sure how such terrible and awful people are even hired.'

author: Nick T.
text: 'Not the fault of the staff
column5: fault of the app orders. Too many orders
column6: too few staff
column7: can’t even take in-person orders anymore. Staff were extremely nice and hard-working though'

author: Mahum Haider
text: 'I’m Muslim and I don’t eat meat
column5: I ordered a veggie burrito bowl and found a piece of meat in my bowl. I complained multiple times but I was never gotten back to. Extremely unprofessional and rude behavior.'

author: Jon Himottu
text: 'Apparently you can only order from the app. They wouldn’t allow normal counter orders. When I went on the app I had to select a “pick up time” which was 15-30 minutes in the future.\n\nSo
column5: I went to QDoba (it’s 1 block away) and they have normal ordering at counter\n\nIt’s really annoying because Chipotle is better food. I don’t understand why they do this....'

author: rajat dixit
text: 'Ordered vegetarian bowl but came mix with meat tried calling the restaurant the machine didn’t put me through. You guys have violated my religious beliefs..'

author: Matt Yablonsky
text: 'The wait time for online orders is consistently 20+ min behind schedule. After waiting I  was told my online order was "erased from the system" and the manager literally asked me to go to the back of the long lunch line.'

author: Madeline Sanchez
text: 'Everything is delicious. I’ll come here again and again.'

author: Emily Ng
text: 'I love Chipotle and the workers were so nice but my rice was really hard :('

author: Sharon Yates
text: 'Thank you to staff here- order came in exactly as requested and tasted great!'

author: Adriel '
text: "It's chipotle people
column5: what's not to love"

author: Maya C
text: 'Food taste like any other Chipotle BUT the service is exceptional!!!! Nothing like any other Chipotle Location. The employee who helped us really likes what he does and they give Law Enforcement discounts which is very generous of them.'

author: Leopoldo Sciarra
text: 'Love getting chicken or steak in my salad bowls it is great 👍 😋'

author: Joe Minuti
text: 'Good food at a great price. Mexican American style food for a quick meal.'

author: Khori Heavey
text: 'Ordered with postmates. I love to get fajita veggies. They are normally nicely seasoned with salt and pepper. I was served raw onions as fajitas and no peppers. Not sure who’s prepping.. but giving a bad name to chipotle.'

author: Anmol
text: 'Less quantity
column5: poor service
column6: food was cold..staff was rude

author: Jamie Hyrkas
text: 'Incorrect order
column5: chips were stale
column6: meat was cold'

author: Emily Ackerley
text: 'Very friendly staff'

author: Melanie Tam
text: "Chipotle is Chipotle (when they don't have their e. coli/salmonella outbreaks). I've probably only been to this location once before and it was years ago. I recently gave it a visit during the pandemic because the BOGO entree deal on DoorDash got me. I ordered ahead and when I got there
column5: I saw that the pick up orders are organized at the front according to your initials. I don't know if it's first initial or last
column6: but just check both. Mine wasn't ready yet but I asked the cashier and they just told me to wait by the front
column7: and it was ready shortly. This was nice because you have less people breathing around the food area (even though everyone needs to wear a mask inside). You can still order there but I don’t get why people still do this
column8: when you can order ahead and have the food ready for you

author: Andrew Price
text: 'I had a 5 star review that said: "I\'ve tried Chipotle all around the country and this is the best one hands down. Always has the freshest food."\n\nBefore the pandemic
column5: we were regulars here.\n\nBut
column6: I\'ve changed my review to 2 stars. Taste is still great
column7: but they are unbelievably skimpy on the ingredients. You can\'t order at the counter anymore - you have to order through the app or the website. Order "fajita veggies" and get 5 little pieces. Order "extra sour cream" and it\'s as dry as a bone.'

author: Premal Shanghvi
text: 'Always consistent and a healthy option.'

author: Frances Levy
text: 'I obnoxiously ordered two burritos at like
column5: 10:15 pm without realizing that the restaurant closed at 10:00 pm. These awesome people were probably in the midst of cleaning and shutting down when my order came in. They still made my food and sent it out for delivery. I guess they ran out of steak before closing up
column6: so these amazing lads sent me two other choices of meat in to-go containers for me to choose from. I work in the food industry
column7: so I know how annoying it is for customers to come in right before closing to order.\n\nThanks

author: Mayank Bindal
text: 'I love Chipotle but this is the worst location. This is the location I unfortunately have to order from for delivery and they have consistent track record of messing up my order. Its either too little or too much
column5: but never right. This is making me believe that  probably Chipotle is not meant for this post pandemic reality and NOT meant for ordering online.'

author: suchita aishwarya
text: "Why don't people listen the order carefully??"

author: Mark Leach
text: 'Burritos w/ your choice is great will fill you up.'

author: Lenny Botanick
text: 'The employees at this place are no good. Their menu is like 5 items they can’t even learn them? Your semi-closed food bowl is guaranteed to drip all over. Garbage service. Bye bye'

author: Lupo Gold
text: 'I’ve been to this location a few times. On my most recent visit
column5: 6/27 when I walked in there was loud music playing and people dropping the F bomb in the back. It was like I walked into more of a frat party than a food establishment. Oh well I thought. I get home and take my receipt out of the bag and also found they charged me for guac when I didn’t have guac. I ended up just throwing the food away because I started questioning the food safety etc. The whole experience was terrible.\n\nThat’s the problem with corporate owned restaurant chains. They have all the money and resources to build out in prime locations but zero pride in ownership. It’s just a P&L statement at the end of the month. This place needs a shakeup. Avoid it.'

author: Kevin Muraca
text: 'Food was tasty
column5: except there Was lettuce I didn’t ask for
column6: no cheese
column7: and no rice… don’t think till be taking another chance with them for a while.'

author: Nicholas Gallo
text: 'Ordered delivery through them and didn’t receive my full order. When I called to remedy the situation (delivery of missing items or refund) they said I had to take it up with the driver which I had no contact with.\n\nThis particular Chipotle seems to be poorly managed.'

author: Jordan Tang
text: 'One of the few places in the area that is healthy
column5:
filling and cheap.

It’s about $8 for a chicken rice bowl and the portion is quite large.

The staff here are friendly but it’s usually busy
column6:
so make sure you know what you want to order before getting in line.

It doesn’t get too crowded inside so there’s usually places to sit.

Food was good
column7:
tasted fresh like most chipotle’s do.

They could clean up the place a little though.

Overall great experience.'

author: Ginette B
text: 'Most affordable Chipotle around'

author: Nicholas Matranga
text: 'Great location. Employees were kind and helpful.'

author: Juan Pineda
text: "don't go to this chipotle worst experience"

author: Jaime Sanchez
text: 'Not a good services
column5: person who take my order looks like she wasnt to be there'

author: Andy Lee
text: "Mixed bag
column5: sometimes it's a 5 star experience
column6: sometimes it's a 1 star experience.  Sometimes you get your fair share of food
column7: sometimes you get workers rationing your food.  Sometimes it looks like they keep good sanitary practices
column8: sometimes you are wise to go elsewhere."

author: Juli Alvarez
text: '(Translated by Google) Very spicy
column5:
the employees did not attend well

(Original)
Muy picante
column6: las empleadas no atendían bien'

author: Jenny Colon
text: 'Rushed and rude cashier. She had about 3 people in front of her and was already trying to take my payment. No type of customer interaction at all. I completely understand they become busy and have to keep the line moving. On top of it all my food was a bit cold.'

author: Doris Nicholson
text: 'Good chicken bowl with brown rice'

author: Frank F
text: 'Pretty goos lunch spot.'

author: Edwin Tejada
text: "Charged me for a soda and chips when I never ordered that. Sadly
column5: it was a take out order. I couldn't go back. Please check your orders before you leave they tend to do that. I've been here twice already"

author: Paul Jenkins
text: 'This Chipotle location used to be good. For the past year or so the quality has been hit or miss
column5: with more misses than hits. Most of the employees do not seem to care at all when preparing the food. A couple times I’ve had cold food that is supposed to be hot
column6: which makes me wondering if I’m going to get sick. Lazily throwing things around and making mistakes. The dining area is often dirty. Not like it used to be.'

author: Maureen R Edwards
text: 'Chipotle is everything!'

author: Anabel Rodriguez
text: "I attend  this chipotle location all the time and this is the second time I have an issue with this employee. she was rude and when I ask to remake my bowl because she added the wrong sauce she rolled her eyes at me. The manager was careless about the situation. When you're serving people food you need to be careful
column5: and she was just there serving food like if it was for an animal. Her name was Hennessey"

author: Darren Dean
text: 'I’ve decided not to return to this location.  Poor service multiple times in less than a week.  Lack of attentiveness to cleanliness
column5: listening to the customer
column6: and respect of food allergies is consistent.'

author: stephanie demetrios
text: 'Just bought two chicken bowls to go. The guy that was "attending" me wasn\'t literally listening to me
column5: because his buddies were behind me. Instead of listening to me about my two orders
column6: he just went ahead and started talking to them.\n\nWhen he had to remake one
column7: he literally didn\'t even put any rice on the bowl
column8: and at that point I was tired enough to even complain.\n\nChipotle Hoboken
column9: teach your employees to be more attentive to your customers
column10: because I can just go to Quality Greens Kitchen (which is right next door)'

author: Steve Springer
text: 'Ran out of food at 830pm on a Tuesday. They close at 10pm. No one who worked there seemed to care.'

author: Mr. Solomon
text: 'Very great place to eat with excellent you ladies .'

author: Sanchit Kamath
text: 'A wholesome meal for 10$
column5: one of the best budget restaurant I have come across during my stay here.'

author: Olga Smith
text:
'(Translated by Google) I loved. Excellent meal

(Original)
Me encantó. Excelente comida'

author: Slagathor
text: "Horrible food and it might not be food....just salt shaped like other things.  This may be the worst food I've ever had NOBODY EAT HERE!  SHUT THIS PLACE DOWN!"

author: Official Officer Zion
text: 'Good food good service'

author: Leo Pakl
text: 'Love Chipotle
column5: every time I have one in the area I have to have burrito at Chipotle! Fresh ingredients and staff is fast and listen to you when you request a modification to the tortilla.'

author: Margaret Ann Johnson
text: 'Employee Jayda was the cashier in Hoboken restaurant was super nice.'

author: Brian Spector
text: 'Went there basically during a rush hour on Sunday night and although the staff did not have everything behind the counter ready to go
column5: they were all hustling to get orders out and being friendly to anyone that was in line.'

author: S Sullivan
text: 'Soda machine not working
column5: tables needed cleaning.'

author: juan villegas
text: '(Translated by Google) Perfect
column5: very nice
column6:
they also speak Spanish

(Original)
Perfecto

author: Jen Toro
text: 'There was a bug in my food

text: 'Wanted to have spicy food

author: Henry Hernandez
text: "There was nothing wrong with this experience. However
column5: I recently learned that it is illegal for commercial businesses to not recycle in New Jersey. I've been to a couple locations that are in New Jersey
column6: specifically the Wayne location which does not offer recycling. This is illegal. And morally concerning."

author: Christopher Kali
text: 'Just like any other Chipotle. This one was a tad unclean. Not egregious
column5: but could have used more attention.'

text: 'Amazing...'

author: Anuj Mittal
text: 'It is okay like any other chipotle. I prefer dos toros as the food feels more fresh'

text: 'I ordered Veggie Bowl from Chipotle App and I received Veggie bowl which had Meat piece in it. There was no help from Restaurant. I don’t know what should I do next.'

text: 'Service can be better but the food is great and fresh.'

text: 'Just like any other Chipotle'

author: Johnny Kong
text: 'Consistent service
column5: taste and quality in their chain of restaurants. I always get the veggie bowl. It is filling and delicious. The guacamole really makes this dish a treat to eat.'

author: Patrick Howard
text: 'African American women gave me litterly 3 strips of barbacoa
column5: most of the staff seemed like they didn’t want to be there. Worst chipotle i’ve been to in my life.\nEdit: Meat looked like it was sitting there all day'

author: Daniel Ginsburg
text: "My favorite location - always really clean
column5: plenty of seats available
column6: excellent service
column7: and it's fun to watch people go by when sitting in the front of the restaurant."

author: Dane White
text: 'Typical chipotle but it was 40 minutes before closing and they let things dry out and portions low
column5: young staff ready to go home.'

author: Ratheesh Menon
text: 'Nice food'

author: Latasha Swinton
text: 'My son is in love with this place very good food.'

author: Kunal Saraf
text: 'SATISFYING ❤️'

author: Chauncey Scott
text: "This particular Chipotle can be hit or miss. Sometimes I find that the fajita veggies are not cooked long enough and add a weird texture to my bowl/burrito. Also the consistency on the rice isn't always there. A couple times the brown rice was underdone. However the staff is always very pleasant and efficient. As someone who also works in Hoboken the clientele can be demanding
column5: and I've witnessed first hand the team members handle odd requests with grace. Additionally I'm willing to look past the aforementioned issues bc Chipotle is one of the few reasonably priced options for lunch in Hoboken."

author: Namita Sethiya Khemka
text: 'Loved the burrito n tacos'

author: Arseny Ruev
text: 'Got a steak burrito and the guy couldn’t even roll it up blamed it on “too much sour cream in it” worse chipotle I’ve ever been in. Train your employees on how to roll them properly!! Not coming back'

author: Will Huegel
text: 'Monday evening staff here is the fastest team I’ve ever seen. I basically jogged from rice to register. Nice work guys!'

author: James Hogg
text: "Great burritos
column5: with an amazing choice of salads and fillings. Staff are very friendly and helpful to people on their first visit to the franchise.  Sadly my burrito wasn't very warm.  But otherwise a good experience."

text: "Need a place to eat and don't have lot of time
column5:
this is the place for you.
Want a place to eat and that is healthy and not deep fried in grease.
I really liked my visit to this place.
The place is absolutely worth a visit.
It gives you so many food options and that too amazing ones."
